skins.shipDescription: Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser ¨C Brooklyn, Hull Number CL-40!
skins.selfIntroduction: As the representative of the then newly constructed pre-war cruisers, I was put in charge of foreign diplomacy. That said, my firepower is never to be underestimated, so please put your mind at ease.
skins.acquisition: I am Brooklyn. I am an elite cruiser, so you may let me handle all foreign diplomacy matters.
skins.login: You came just in time. A few files need your signature.
skins.details: This information is confidential, so please keep it a closely guarded secret.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's important to communicate with other nations.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Please don't stare at me in such a weird way.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I may be a diplomat, but don't even think about underestimating my power.
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you interested in my tanned skin, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: A diplomat is not the same thing as a secretary... Please, restrain yourself, Commander!
